1:7-1:8: NUMBER :: `32` :: uN[32]

2:0-2:39: FUNCTION :: `fn id(x: u32) -> u32 {
    pid<u32:32>(x)
}` :: (uN[32]) -> uN[32]

2:6-2:7: NAME_DEF :: `x` :: uN[32]

    pid<u32:32>(x)
}` :: uN[32]

2:26-2:37: INVOCATION :: `pid<u32:32>(x)` :: uN[32]
